attributes.action: a prime minister to run Britain who cares about British people & what they want
attributes.background: I want action on Britain no one seems to listen to what British people want, we want to be removed from the EU stop letting people into our country for free homes, benefits, and most of all NHS British people deserve more and so does Britain! We need someone better than David Cameron to take a stand

rejection.details: Sorry - we are not clear what specific action you are requesting. You might find it helpful to look at some of the other petitions on the website.
